items.content_html: AvalynxDatatable is a simple, lightweight, and customizable datatable for the web. Based on Bootstrap >=5.3 without any framework dependencies.
items.title: avalynx/avalynx-datatable: AvalynxDatatable is a simple, lightweight, and customizable datatable for the web. Based on Bootstrap >=5.3 without any framework dependencies.

items.content_html: The HTML CSS JS Music Player is a lightweight, web-based music player designed to play audio files using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project provides a simple yet functional interface for users to listen to their favorite songs directly from their web browser.
items.title: mayurmadankar/Music-Player: The HTML CSS JS Music Player is a lightweight, web-based music player designed to play audio files using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project provides a simple yet functional interface for users to listen to their favorite songs directly from their web browser.

items.title: nnmarcoo/img: Lightweight image viewer

items.content_html: Lit is a simple library for building fast, lightweight web components.
items.title: lit/lit: Lit is a simple library for building fast, lightweight web components.

items.content_html: LLRT (Low Latency Runtime) is an experimental, lightweight JavaScript runtime designed to address the growing demand for fast and efficient Serverless applications.
items.title: awslabs/llrt: LLRT (Low Latency Runtime) is an experimental, lightweight JavaScript runtime designed to address the growing demand for fast and efficient Serverless applications.

items.content_html: a lightweight typescript responsive slides swiper
items.title: gsebdev/sg-swiper: a lightweight typescript responsive slides swiper

items.title: benchesh/cypress-multithreaded-runner: A lightweight method to run Cypress spec files in multiple threads, with built-in support for Allure report generation

items.title: pinceladasdaweb/node-url-shortener: A modern and lightweight URL shortener using Node.js, Fastify, Postgres and Redis.

items.title: ttimot24/HorizontCMS: Lightweight CMS built on Laravel 9, VueJs 2.6 and Bootstrap 5.2. An alternative platform to OctoberCMS

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library based on annotatedtext and rehype-parse for converting html documents into an annotated text format consumable by LanguageTool as AnnotatedText.
items.title: prosegrinder/annotatedtext-rehype: A lightweight JavaScript library based on annotatedtext and rehype-parse for converting html documents into an annotated text format consumable by LanguageTool as AnnotatedText.

items.content_html: Stim.js is a lightweight, framework agnostic, JavaScript front-end framework designed to accelerate and add interactivity to server side rendering (SSR) apps.
items.title: SoftwarePunt/stim.js: Stim.js is a lightweight, framework agnostic, JavaScript front-end framework designed to accelerate and add interactivity to server side rendering (SSR) apps.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting markup documents into an annotated text format consumable by LanguageTool.
items.title: prosegrinder/annotatedtext: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting markup documents into an annotated text format consumable by LanguageTool.

items.title: prosegrinder/annotatedtext-remark: A lightweight JavaScript library based on annotatedtext and remark-parse for converting markdown documents into an annotated text format consumable by LanguageTool as AnnotatedText.

items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.
items.title: testcontainers/testcontainers-node: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

items.content_html: Lightweight JS library for communication with the empaia workbench service.
items.title: RationAI/EmpationAPI: Lightweight JS library for communication with the empaia workbench service.

items.content_html: QueryX is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides a jQuery-like interface for DOM manipulation and traversal. It allows you to select elements, add/remove classes, manipulate attributes, traverse the DOM, and more, similar to jQuery but in a simpler and more lightweight manner.
items.title: SH20RAJ/QueryX: QueryX is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides a jQuery-like interface for DOM manipulation and traversal. It allows you to select elements, add/remove classes, manipulate attributes, traverse the DOM, and more, similar to jQuery but in a simpler and more lightweight manner.

items.content_html: LazyLoad is a lightweight, flexible script that speeds up your website by deferring the loading of your below-the-fold images, backgrounds, videos, iframes and scripts to when they will enter the viewport. Written in plain "vanilla" JavaScript, it leverages IntersectionObserver, supports responsive images and enables native lazy loading.
items.title: verlok/vanilla-lazyload: LazyLoad is a lightweight, flexible script that speeds up your website by deferring the loading of your below-the-fold images, backgrounds, videos, iframes and scripts to when they will enter the viewport. Written in plain "vanilla" JavaScript, it leverages IntersectionObserver, supports responsive images and enables native lazy loading.

items.content_html: barcode-tool is a lightweight npm package that utilizes the Barcode Detection API to enable barcode scanning directly in web browsers. Easily integrate barcode scanning functionality into your web applications for inventory management, product identification, and more.
items.title: jercatallo/barcode-tool: barcode-tool is a lightweight npm package that utilizes the Barcode Detection API to enable barcode scanning directly in web browsers. Easily integrate barcode scanning functionality into your web applications for inventory management, product identification, and more.
